name: EmailCog
short: Forward Gmail messages to Discord channels
description: A cog that forwards unread Gmail messages to configured Discord channels using Gmail API. Supports per-guild configuration and channel-specific email sender filtering.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores email sender configurations for Discord channels and Gmail API credentials locally.
install_msg: Thanks for installing EmailCog! Please make sure to set up Gmail API credentials and place them in the cog's data directory as 'credentials.json'. Use `[p]help emailcog` to see available commands.
author: mrdyl
